spec_data.Name: blueproximity
spec_data.Description:
Add security to your desktop by automatically locking and unlocking
the screen when you and your phone leave/enter the desk. Think of a
proximity detector for your mobile phone via bluetooth.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Detects you via your bluetooth devices and locks/unlocks the screen
